Posts.Content: Krisking wrote: I had a stereotypical biopsy in February came back suspicious for DCIS had my partial mastectomy lady Tuesday and nurse called today that they found more suspicious DCIS so I need another lumpectomy, is this normal? To have several lumpectomies in same breast? What are the risks? How are the recovery? Longer? My partial mastectomy also included reconstruction, I am confused and devastated. Please hel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Multiple lumpectomies Krisking Moderators
